title: MyPortfolio - Interactive Developer Portfolio
description: A modern and interactive developer portfolio built with Next.js 15 and React 19, featuring smooth animations, 3D visuals, and a clean, responsive UI. Designed with TailwindCSS 4 for scalability and Framer Motion for engaging transitions. Includes SEO optimization, performance tuning, and showcases key projects with style.

title: Devlense - GitHub Profile Finder
description: A powerful GitHub profile finder that allows users to search and explore developer profiles by username, skills, and activity. Features include profile analytics, repository insights, and contribution tracking.

title: Pizgoria - Telecom Tower Monitoring
description: Comprehensive telecom tower monitoring system with real-time data visualization, alert management, and predictive maintenance features. Built for telecom companies to monitor tower health and performance.

title: Isol - Solar Monitoring System
description: Advanced solar panel monitoring platform with real-time energy production tracking, performance analytics, and automated maintenance scheduling. Designed for solar farm operators and homeowners.

title: TechTalksWithOmee - Blog
description: Modern blog platform built with Next.js and Sanity CMS, featuring markdown support, SEO optimization, and responsive design. A space for sharing technical insights and tutorials.
